title: Confessions of Joe Developer
description:
Confessions of Joe Developer

Presented by Daniel Greenfeld

Over the course of 6 years of Python development at NASA, Revsys, and
Eldarion; Daniel Greenfeld has picked up a lot of easy tricks stolen
from the best and brightest in the Python community that make him look
good in front of his peers and clients. And now, at great risk to his
career and reputation, he is going to show you how he does it.
